name: MammotionRobot
0:
”Alexa, ask mammotion robot to start working”
”Alexa, ask mammotion robot to pause working”
”Alexa, ask mammotion robot to stop working”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mammotion robot
des:
The Mammotion Robot skill streamlines your lawn mowing experience, eliminating the need for manual control through any terminal. To use it, start by downloading and installing the Mammotion app, ensuring that you link your device to it and keep it online. Afterward, enable the skill.
Please note that before commencing a job, you must create at least one task in advance. Here are some voice command examples that allow you to start working, pause, stop, return to the charging dock, and check the status:

WORKING:
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to start working
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to start working with backyard
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to start task backyard

PAUSE:
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to pause working
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to pause task
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to hold on

CONTINUE:
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to continue working
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to continue mowing
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to resume

STOP:
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to stop working
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot to stop mowing
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot end the task

RETURN:
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot return to charging
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot start charging
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot go back

STATUS:
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot status
- Alexa, ask mammotion robot where is it
